        Parameters:
        quizID - ID of quiz to check
        userID - ID of user to check
        Returns:

      • GetAllAnswersByUserID

        public java.util.List<AnswerTable> GetAllAnswersByUserID(int userID)
        Method to get results for given user ID. Results for users with and without authority are different
        Parameters:
        userID - ID of user to get associated results
        Returns:
        If user has authority returns results of quizzes created by user, else returns results of quizzes solved by user

        Parameters:
        quizID - ID of solved quiz
        userID - ID of user who solved the quiz
        correctedCount - Number of not correcteds
        trueCount - Number of trues
        falseCount - Number of falses

      • SaveQuestion

        public int SaveQuestion(int customID,
                        Question question)
        Saves given question to database. First inserts the common Question attributes. Then calls question type specific methods to insert remaining parts to the database
        Parameters:
        customID - ID to specify if this is a new insertion or an update
        question - Question to insert
        Returns:
        ID of question inserted to database

                                     int quizID)

        Parameters:

        quizID - ID of quiz to associate with

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • UserRegister

        public void UserRegister(java.lang.String username,
                         java.lang.String password)
        Predefined database insert method for user register. Gets credentials and tries to insert to database
        Parameters:
        username - Username for new user
        password - Password for new user

      • UserLogin

        public User UserLogin(java.lang.String username,
                      java.lang.String password)
        Predefined database search method for user login. Gets all user information from database and then checks if given credentials exist on the table
        Parameters:
        username - Username to check
        password - Password to check
        Returns:
        If doesn't exists returns null, else returns a User object according to authority level

      • UserExists

        public boolean UserExists(java.lang.String username)
        Checks if given username exists in database
        Parameters:
        username - Username to check
        Returns:
        True if username exists, else false
